summary: This is an email exchange from December 31, 2019, discussing a financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell. The email reveals Maxwell has a USAA account and a credit card under the name Ghislaine Borgerson, and the sender is requesting a subpoena and NDO (likely Non-Disclosure Order or similar) to investigate transactions and package destinations.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses her USAA account and credit card under an alias, and the need to subpoena her financial records to track transactions and packages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Borgerson
persons.context: Identified as the name under which Ghislaine Maxwell's credit card for purchases is held, indicating use of an alias.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is using the name Ghislaine Borgerson as an alias for a credit card account.

events.title: Email request for Maxwell financial subpoena
events.description: An email is sent requesting a subpoena and NDO for Ghislaine Maxwell's USAA account to investigate transactions and track packages.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell maintained a USAA bank account that was under investigation as of late 2019.
Maxwell used the alias 'Ghislaine Borgerson' for a credit card used for purchases.
Investigators noted 'quite a few transactions' from the account and wanted to track where packages were being sent.
The correspondence shows an active financial investigation into Maxwell was underway at the end of 2019, with a subpoena application being sent to court.
